How many people are affected by otopalatodigital syndrome type 2 ?,"Otopalatodigital syndrome type 2 is a rare disorder, affecting fewer than 1 in every 100,000 individuals. Its specific incidence is unknown.",GHR,otopalatodigital syndrome type 2
